listitem.para:
enum { DAOS_RECLAIM_DISABLED = 0, DAOS_RECLAIM_LAZY, DAOS_RECLAIM_SNAPSHOT, DAOS_RECLAIM_BATCH,
DAOS_RECLAIM_TIME }

enum daos_cont_props { DAOS_PROP_CO_MIN = 0x1000, DAOS_PROP_CO_LABEL, DAOS_PROP_CO_LAYOUT_TYPE, DAOS_PROP_CO_LAYOUT_VER,
DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM, DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_CHUNK_SIZE, DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_SERVER_VERIFY, DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_FAC,
DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_LVL, DAOS_PROP_CO_SNAPSHOT_MAX, DAOS_PROP_CO_ACL, DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS,
DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT, DAOS_PROP_CO_OWNER, DAOS_PROP_CO_OWNER_GROUP, DAOS_PROP_CO_DEDUP,
DAOS_PROP_CO_DEDUP_THRESHOLD, DAOS_PROP_CO_ROOTS, DAOS_PROP_CO_STATUS, DAOS_PROP_CO_ALLOCED_OID,
DAOS_PROP_CO_EC_CELL_SZ, DAOS_PROP_CO_MAX }

enum { DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_OFF, DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_CRC16, DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_CRC32, DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_CRC64,
DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_SHA1, DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_SHA256, DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_SHA512, DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_ADLER32 }

enum { DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS_OFF, DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS_LZ4, DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS_DEFLATE, DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS_DEFLATE1,
DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS_DEFLATE2, DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS_DEFLATE3, DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS_DEFLATE4 }

enum { DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_OFF, DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_AES_XTS128, DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_AES_XTS256, DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_AES_CBC128,
DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_AES_CBC192, DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_AES_CBC256, DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_AES_GCM128, DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_AES_GCM256 }

enum { DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_RF0, DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_RF1, DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_RF2, DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_RF3,
DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_RF4 }
int daos_prop_from_str (const char *str, daos_size_t len, daos_prop_t **prop)
int daos_prop_set_str (daos_prop_t *prop, uint32_t type, const char *str, daos_size_t len)
int daos_prop_entry_set_str (struct daos_prop_entry *entry, const char *str, daos_size_t len)
int daos_prop_set_ptr (daos_prop_t *prop, uint32_t type, const void *ptr, daos_size_t size)
int daos_prop_entry_set_ptr (struct daos_prop_entry *entry, const void *ptr, daos_size_t size)
int daos_prop_entry_dup_ptr (struct daos_prop_entry *entry_dst, struct daos_prop_entry *entry_src, size_t len)

section.title: daos_cont_props
section.para: DAOS container property types valid in rage (DAOS_PROP_CO_MIN, DAOS_PROP_CO_MAX).

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_LABELDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_LABEL DAOS_PROP_CO_LABEL

entry.para: Label - a string that a user can associated with a container. default = ""

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_LAYOUT_TYPEDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_LAYOUT_TYPE DAOS_PROP_CO_LAYOUT_TYPE

entry.para: Layout type: unknown, POSIX, HDF5, Python, Database, Parquet, ... default value = DAOS_PROP_CO_LAYOUT_UNKNOWN

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_LAYOUT_VERDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_LAYOUT_VER DAOS_PROP_CO_LAYOUT_VER

entry.para: Layout version: specific to middleware for interop. default = 1

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUMDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM

entry.para: Checksum on/off + checksum type (CRC16, CRC32, SHA-1 & SHA-2). default = DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_OFF

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_CHUNK_SIZEDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_CHUNK_SIZE DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_CHUNK_SIZE

entry.para: Checksum chunk size default = 32K

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_SERVER_VERIFYDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_SERVER_VERIFY DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_SERVER_VERIFY

entry.para: Checksum verification on server. Value = ON/OFF default = DAOS_PROP_CO_CSUM_SV_OFF

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_FACDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_FAC DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_FAC

entry.para: Redundancy factor: RF(n): Container I/O restricted after n faults. default = RF0 (DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_RF0)

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_LVLDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_LVL DAOS_PROP_CO_REDUN_LVL

entry.para: Redundancy level: default fault domain level for placement. default = 1 (rank level)

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_SNAPSHOT_MAXDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_SNAPSHOT_MAX DAOS_PROP_CO_SNAPSHOT_MAX

entry.para: Maximum number of snapshots to retain.

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_ACLDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_ACL DAOS_PROP_CO_ACL

entry.para: ACL: access control list for container An ordered list of access control entries detailing user and group access privileges. Expected to be in the order: Owner, User(s), Group(s), Everyone

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESSDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS

entry.para: Determine whether inline compression is enabled Value: DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS_OFF/LZ4/DEFLATE[1-4] Default: DAOS_PROP_CO_COMPRESS_OFF

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPTDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT

entry.para: Determine whether encryption is enabled Value: DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_OFF, DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_AES_XTS{128,256}, DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_AES_CBC{128,192,256}, DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_AES_GCM{128,256} Default: DAOS_PROP_CO_ENCRYPT_OFF

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_OWNERDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_OWNER DAOS_PROP_CO_OWNER

entry.para: The user who acts as the owner of the container. Format: user@[domain]

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_OWNER_GROUPDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_OWNER_GROUP DAOS_PROP_CO_OWNER_GROUP

entry.para: The group that acts as the owner of the container. Format: group@[domain]

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_DEDUPDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_DEDUP DAOS_PROP_CO_DEDUP

entry.para: Determine whether deduplication is enabled Require checksum to be enabled Value DAOS_PROP_CO_DEDUP_OFF/MEMCMP/HASH Default: DAOS_PROP_CO_DEDUP_OFF

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_DEDUP_THRESHOLDDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_DEDUP_THRESHOLD DAOS_PROP_CO_DEDUP_THRESHOLD

entry.para: Deduplication threshold size Default: 4K

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_ROOTSDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_ROOTS DAOS_PROP_CO_ROOTS

entry.para: First citizen objects of container, see daos_cont_root_oids

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_STATUSDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_STATUS DAOS_PROP_CO_STATUS

entry.para: Container status Value "struct daos_co_status".

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_ALLOCED_OIDDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_ALLOCED_OID DAOS_PROP_CO_ALLOCED_OID

entry.para: OID value to start allocation from

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_CO_EC_CELL_SZDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_CO_EC_CELL_SZ DAOS_PROP_CO_EC_CELL_SZ

entry.para: EC cell size, it can overwrite DAOS_PROP_CO_EC_CELL_SZ of pool

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_PO_SPACE_RBDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_PO_SPACE_RB DAOS_PROP_PO_SPACE_RB

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_PO_SELF_HEALDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_PO_SELF_HEAL DAOS_PROP_PO_SELF_HEAL

row.entry: DAOS_PROP_PO_OWNER_GROUPDAOS Pool/Container Initialization DAOS Pool/Container InitializationDAOS_PROP_PO_OWNER_GROUP DAOS_PROP_PO_OWNER_GROUP

entry.para: properties to be freed.

section.title: daos_prop_from_str()

para.computeroutput: int daos_prop_from_str (const char * str, daos_size_t len, daos_prop_t ** prop)

section.para: Allocate a new property from a string buffer of property entries and values. That buffer has to be of the format: prop_entry_name1:value1;prop_entry_name2:value2;prop_entry_name3:value3; prop must be freed with daos_prop_free() to release allocated space. This supports properties that can be modified on container creation only: label, cksum, cksum_size, srv_cksum, dedup, dedup_threshold, compression, encryption, rf, ec_cell

entry.para: Serialized string of property entries and their values
Serialized string length
Property that is created

section.para: Check a DAOS prop entry for a pointer value.

entry.para: Entry to be checked.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: true Has a pointer value. false Does not have a pointer value.

section.title: daos_prop_has_str()
section.para: Check a DAOS prop entry for a string value.

entry.para: Entry to be checked.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: true Has a string value. false Does not have a string value.

section.title: daos_prop_merge()
section.para: Merge a set of new DAOS properties into a set of existing DAOS properties.

entry.para: Existing set of properties
New properties - may override old entries

section.title: daos_prop_set_ptr()

para.computeroutput: int daos_prop_set_ptr (daos_prop_t * prop, uint32_t type, const void * ptr, daos_size_t size)

section.para: Set the pointer value of a property entry in a property. The property type must expect that it's entry is of a pointer type. This duplicates the buffer internally and the entry buffer is freed with daos_free_prop(). The user does not need to keep the string buffer around after this function is called. If the entry already has a value set, it frees that and overwrites it with this new value.

entry.para: Property list
Type of property to look for
Pointer to value of entry to set
Size of value

section.title: daos_prop_set_str()

para.computeroutput: int daos_prop_set_str (daos_prop_t * prop, uint32_t type, const char * str, daos_size_t len)

section.para: Set the string value of a property entry in a property. The property type must expect that it's entry is of a string type. This duplicates the string internally and the entry string is freed with daos_free_prop(). The user does not need to keep the string buffer around after this function is called. If the entry already has a string value set, it frees that and overwrites it with this new string.

entry.para: Property list
Type of property to look for
String value to set in the prop entry
Length of str
